General.Name: HiteJinro Co Ltd
General.Description: HITEJINRO Co., Ltd. operates as a liquor company in South Korea. It provides beer, soju, whisky, wine, sake, and other products. It also exports its products to 50 countries. The company was formerly known as Jinro Ltd and changed its name to HITEJINRO Co., Ltd. in September 2011. HITEJINRO Co., Ltd. was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Hite Jinro Building, Seoul, South Korea
